description: Indulge in our selection of fine wines and spirits.

plates.name: Moschofilero Boutari White Wine
plates.description: Pale yellow with greenish-yellow highlights, featuring an intense varietal aroma of flowers and citrus on the nose and palate—predominantly white rose and orange blossom. A fresh wine, full-bodied and well-balanced, with a long-lasting aftertaste.

plates.name: Agiorgitiko Boutari Red Wine
plates.description: An attractive deep red color, featuring a rich aromatic bouquet where scents of red fruits, such as plum, balance perfectly with sweet aging notes of vanilla and cocoa. It is full-bodied with excellent structure, balance, and a velvety finish.
